law.catch_line: Notification concerning Kentucky Consumer Product Safety Program.

text.section: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall notify licensed child-care centers and certified family child-care homes on an ongoing basis, including during the license or certification application process and any monitoring visits, of the Kentucky Consumer Product Safety Program and the program's Web site. Licensed child-care centers shall post in a prominent location a notice of the existence of the Consumer Product Safety Program and the program's Web site.
The Cabinet for Health and Family Services may promulgate administrative regulations to carry out this section.
This section may be cited as The Child Safety Act of 2009.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009.
